name: Swing to Bin
description:
A physics based simple puzzle game to understand the suspension, swinging, gravity, and collision.

Cut the chain at the right moment to make the connected ball fall directly into the bin placed on the floor or by calculated bouncing behavior.

The speed of the game can be varied which changes the gravity that is applied on the ball.
Change speed, mute audio and check your stats in the settings.

Love your feedback. Help me improve the game. Shoot me a mail at arjun.c193@gmail.com
